name: Pocket Hole
description:
Controls: "Z" and "X" for interacting, arrow keys for movement.

Play as John, a boy who is mysteriously sent to an alternate dimension  where he has to collect, battle, and talk to... holes? Really?

Features:

  • Collect holes each with unique stats and skills.
  • Casual time-based battle system: A little of bit of luck and skill.
  • Hole puns and "funny" jokes.
  • Multiple areas and boss battles.
  • A plot twist you WON'T see coming (shh).
